issue.body:

Microsoft edge android is the only option for a lot of people (extension support etc.) if you guys don't support Microsoft edge android stable version I won't report any issues from that browser anymore. 1111 Cloudflare warp VPN is enabled BTW bc I live in a p. sensitive state. ``` Username: @gototheskinny ``` ### Screenshots
